issue_title: [Bug] Todo.__init__ 不验证 text 为非空字符串，允许空字符串
commit_message: fix(todo): add text validation in Todo.__init__ (#3693)

validation_status.ruff_command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_minimal_framework.py

fix_summary: Added text validation in Todo.__post_init__ to strip whitespace and reject empty strings. The fix raises ValueError with message 'Todo text cannot be empty' for both empty strings and whitespace-only strings.
